main.name: Tran Tien Dat
main.description: I am a coder in Vietnam, I love working with computers, learning software development and trying out all types of technology. Welcome to my resume page
main.bio: I enjoy programing and making software, I can create websites, mobile apps and games. Seeing my ideas come to life after days of problem solving alway bring me satisfaction. I like to learn new things by start building stuff with them. Beside that, I love playing games, reading books and hitting the gym.
main.contactmessage: If you think I can help with your project, to contact me, please send me an email or submit to the form below, thankyou.

resume.skillmessage: These are my favorite techs and tools I have experience working with

education.description: I attended college for two and a half years. Here I learned the basics of programing and software development, discovered my passion for programming, the fascinating logic behind computer and application systems. It was here I found that I actually good at building software.

After picked up basics knowledge of software technology at the college, I learn all the skills needed to make modern applications from the internet, online courses and tutorials, try building my own projects as I go.

work.title: Intern Developer
work.description: Here I worked as an intern for a local company in six months, help building their sales management web application, using .NET and AngularJS.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: I start with this programing language when working with angularJS. I really like it, it make me feel free

skills.name: C#
skills.description: This one is the first programming language I learned when building my game on Unity.

skills.name: .NET
skills.description: I first learn this when working as intern. Later that I used it to build my own Web API application.

skills.name: Unity
skills.description: Building my own game is alway my dream. And I managed to make an good looking 3D game with it.

skills.name: SQL Database
skills.description: This is the database used in my Web API. It's the database I am most familiar with.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: Git is really useful for me to keep track of my code and working with the other.

skills.name: NodeJS
skills.description: So many awesome libraries and frameworks I can use with this.

skills.name: Expo
skills.description: I used Expo to build my first android apps. React native make mobile app much more easy.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: This is my frontend framework of choice, love the way it break things down to components.

skills.name: AngularJS
skills.description: The first frontend library I learned, spent a good amount of time working with it.

skills.name: Linux
skills.description: One day I'm bored with Windows and go for Linux, and I'm in love since then. I use Arch btw

skills.name: Photoshop
skills.description: I have some graphic design skills, very helpful for making my UI.

projects.title: ASP .NET web api & Blazor app
projects.category: I used .NET for backend and Blazor for frontend

projects.title: Expo mobile app
projects.category: My android app build with Expo, used my .NET backend

projects.title: My thirdperson fantasy game
projects.category: Managed to build this one when I'm still have zero experience in programming. So proud of me

projects.title: My Arch Linux desktop
projects.category: Spent like two weeks sleepless to make this work, it deserve to have a slot here.

testimonials.text: The Web as I envisaged it, we have not seen it yet. The future is still so much bigger than the past
The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it, so it's part of everyday life.
